setting.name: Mystical Realm of Aetheria
setting.description: A fantasy world where magic and technology coexist in an uneasy balance.

storyline.name: The Crystal Prophecy
storyline.description: An epic tale of heroes seeking to prevent the return of ancient darkness.

alignment.name: Lawful Good
alignment.description: Believes in order and doing the right thing.

alignment.name: Chaotic Evil
alignment.description: Values freedom above all and cares little for others.

background.name: Street Thief
background.description: Grew up on the streets, surviving by wit and stealth.

class.name: Wizard
class.description: Masters of arcane magic and ancient knowledge.

class.name: Rogue
class.description: Experts in stealth, locks, and finding opportunity.

race.name: Human
race.description: Versatile and ambitious, the most common race.

race.name: Elf
race.description: Long-lived and graceful, masters of nature magic.

sub_race.name: High Elf
sub_race.description: Elite elves with strong magical abilities.

skills.name: Arcane Magic
skills.description: The ability to cast spells using arcane energy.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: The ability to move unseen and unheard.

actor.title: Archmage
actor.ideal: Knowledge should be used to protect the innocent
actor.bond: My mentor's sacrifice must not be in vain
actor.flaw: I trust too easily in the power of magic to solve problems
actor.appearance: Tall and elegant with silver hair and piercing blue eyes
actor.notes: The most powerful wizard in the kingdom

actor.bond: I owe my life to the thieves' guild that raised me
actor.flaw: I have trouble trusting authority figures
actor.appearance: Lean and quick with dark hair and green eyes

actor_to_race.cultural_upbringing: Raised in the elven courts with full magical training
actor_to_race.heritage_secrets: Descendant of the ancient Moonwhisper line of archmages
actor_to_race.notes: Pure-blooded High Elf with exceptional magical heritage

actor_to_race.cultural_upbringing: Street orphan, no knowledge of family heritage
actor_to_race.notes: Appears to be common human but may have hidden heritage

actor_to_class.notes: Graduated top of her class and became youngest archmage in history
Self-taught with guild training, exceptional natural talent

faction.name: The Royal Court
faction.description: The governing body of the kingdom, led by the monarch.
faction.goals: Maintain order and protect the realm

faction.name: Shadow Thieves Guild
faction.description: A secretive organization of thieves and rogues.
faction.faction_values: Loyalty to the guild, cunning, survival

faction_members.responsibilities: Advise on magical matters, protect the kingdom
faction_members.description: The most trusted magical advisor to the crown
faction_members.notes: Has the king's ear on all magical matters
faction_members.how_joined: Appointed after saving the kingdom from a magical crisis
faction_members.personal_goals: Advance magical knowledge and protect the realm
faction_members.conflicts: Sometimes clashes with military advisors over strategy

location_.name: Silvermoon Capital
location_.description: The grand capital city built around the royal palace.
location_.sights: Towering spires, magical lights dancing in the air
location_.smells: Fresh bread from bakeries, incense from temples
location_.sounds: Bustling marketplace, distant music from taverns
location_.feels: Cool stone under foot, warm magical energy in the air
location_.tastes: Sweet pastries, exotic spices from merchant stalls

history.name: The Great Magical Awakening
history.description: The moment when magic returned to the world after centuries of dormancy.

world_data.name: The Crystal Prophecy
world_data.description: An ancient prophecy that speaks of heroes who will either save or doom the world.

arc_type.name: Hero's Journey
arc_type.description: The classic transformation from ordinary person to hero.

litography_node.name: The Call to Adventure
litography_node.description: Elara receives an urgent message about a growing darkness.

litography_arc.title: Elara's Path to Mastery
litography_arc.description: The archmage's journey to unlock her true potential.
